com.serena.dmclient.api
Interface AuthCertificateProver

public interface AuthCertificateProver

This interface is required to prove certificate authenticity in case when login by Certificate is used. When client connects to server this callback will be called to sign data by certificate's private key, this data will be verified on server using certificate's public key.
